Kevin, after putting his clothes on, realized he had to get back to the school. He ran down the dirt path that led to the side entrance to the school. He snuck in, and went to his dorm. Another burst of pain made him cry out. Kevin slowly pulled himself up beside his best friend, James.
James woke when he heard a moan beside his ear. He gasped as he seen Kevin, who was laying across the bed, writhing in pain. He grunted as his chest erupted, revealing a baby xenomorph alien. Blood soaked everything close to Kevin, including James. The boys cried out in horror. Their terror was short lived though as seven facehuggers burst through the glass.
